item.title: Adani Green Energy Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bullish Market Positioning
item.description: Adani Green Energy Ltd (ADANIGREEN) has witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling increased market participation and potential directional bets. The stock’s recent outperformance relative to its sector and sustained gains over consecutive sessions have attracted heightened investor attention, reflected in a 10.55% rise in OI and robust volume activity. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: KFin Technologies Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Rising Market Activity

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across Indian equities, as 4,075 companies reported results reflecting a modest improvement in profitability and mixed sectoral performances. While mid-cap stocks continue to outperform with a 52.0% positive result ratio, large caps lag behind at 43.0%, underscoring divergent momentum across market capitalisations. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Compuage Infocom Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Compuage Infocom Ltd, a micro-cap player in the IT - Hardware sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 17 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit as intense selling pressure gripped the stock. The share price plummeted by 4.83%, closing at ₹1.38, marking the maximum permissible daily loss and signalling panic selling among investors. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Small-Cap Segment Sees Mixed Performance Amid Broader Market Volatility
item.description: The BSE Smallcap index has experienced a modest decline of 0.4% today, extending a recent five-day slide of 2.75%, signalling a cautious phase for the small-cap segment. Despite this, select stocks within the index have delivered notable returns, underscoring a mixed performance landscape shaped by sectoral divergences and evolving technical outlooks. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Eurotex Industries and Exports Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure

item.title: Mid-Cap Segment Advances 0.62% Led by Strong Sectoral Gains and Broad Market Breadth
item.description: The BSE Midcap index advanced by 0.62% on 17 Feb 2026, outperforming broader market segments as a majority of stocks within the segment registered gains. With 91 stocks advancing against 53 decliners, the advance-decline ratio stood at a healthy 1.72x, signalling broad-based participation. Select mid-cap stocks and sectors contributed decisively to this resilient performance amid mixed global cues and domestic economic data. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Large-Cap Segment Edges Higher Amid Mixed Sector Trends on 17 Feb 2026
item.description: The large-cap segment demonstrated a modest gain on 17 Feb 2026, with the BSE 100 index inching up by 0.16%. Time: 11 minutes ago
